The blades of a pencil sharpener can be used to trim the ends of pencils, pens, and other writing utensils to a more precise point.
A pencil sharpener can be used as a small hand saw to cut through thin materials such as paper, cardboard, and plastic.
The small blades of a pencil sharpener can be used as a miniature knife to open small containers or cut through small pieces of food.
The sharpener can be used to make small holes in materials for stitching or sewing.
The blades of a pencil sharpener can be used to carve small designs or patterns into materials such as wood or plastic.
